00020 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_CHARSTR_HASH_TRAITS_H

00025 namespace Hypertable {
00026 
00031 inline size_t
00032 hash_cstr(const char *s) {
00033   register size_t ret = 0;
00034 
00035   for (; *s; ++s)
00036     ret += (ret << 3) + (unsigned)*s;
00037 
00038   return ret;
00039 }
00040 
00041 struct CstrHashTraits {
00042   typedef CharArena key_allocator;
00043 
00044   struct hasher {
00045     size_t 
00046     operator()(const char *s) const { return hash_cstr(s); }
00047   };
00048 
00049   struct key_equal {
00050     bool
00051     operator()(const char *a, const char *b) const {
00052       return std::strcmp(a, b) == 0;
00053     }
00054   };
00055 };
00056 
00057 inline size_t
00058 hash_case_cstr(const char *s) {
00059   register size_t ret = 0;
00060 
00061   for (; *s; ++s)
00062     ret += (ret << 3) + tolower((unsigned)*s);
00063 
00064   return ret;
00065 }
00066 
00067 struct CstrCaseHashTraits {
00068   typedef CharArena key_allocator;
00069 
00070   struct hasher {
00071     size_t 
00072     operator()(const char *s) const { return hash_case_cstr(s); }
00073   };
00074 
00075   struct key_equal {
00076     bool
00077     operator()(const char *a, const char *b) const {
00078       for (; tolower((unsigned)*a) == tolower((unsigned)*b); ++a, ++b)
00079         if (!*a)
00080           return true;
00081 
00082       return false;
00083     }
00084   };
00085 };
